user_query: Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls, and children of all ages, we are one month away from the adventure of a lifetime, the epic summer movie going event known as Jungle Cruise. You guys are excited? We are so excited. The timing of this movie getting released couldn't be better as we are all trying to get on the other side of COVID and everyone is going back to the movie theaters. It's an exciting time. So ladies and gentlemen, I give you the newest, the greatest, and the latest trailer for Jungle Cruise with myself and my co-star, what's her name? Essa? Every? What is it? Actually, I know what it is. It's rhetorical. Hey, ladies and gentlemen, enjoy Jungle Cruise trailer with myself and Ethel Brunt. In theaters around the world in one month. Enjoy.
